last_episode_to_air.name: Implant Removal & Excess Skin
last_episode_to_air.overview: Vocalist Cassie runs into issues when she seeks surgery for excess skin. Due to her physical job and bad memories, Traci wants her implants out.

name: Skin Decision: Before and After
overview: Skin and beauty expert Nurse Jamie and plastic surgeon Dr. Sheila Nazarian use the latest procedures to bring out their clients' best selves.

episodes.name: These Scars Do Not Define Me
episodes.overview: Katrina hopes to begin healing from a shocking tragedy by erasing the reminders. Sanaz seeks help for confidence-wrecking acne scars.

episodes.name: Car Crash & Quad Mom
episodes.overview: Entrepreneur Nicholas wants to reduce his facial scarring from a near-fatal car crash. Michelle strives to reclaim her body after having quadruplets.

episodes.name: Beauty Isn't Dangerous
episodes.overview: Slashed in the face during an infamous attack, ex-model Marla feels ready to focus again on her appearance. Ashley undergoes surgery for sagging skin.

episodes.name: Feeling Like Myself
episodes.overview: Atticus looks to surgery to make a lifelong dream come true. Lauralee aims to enhance her face and body as she reenters the dating scene.

episodes.name: I Always Look Pregnant
episodes.overview: After four kids, performer Melissa needs a fix for her distended stomach. Nurse Jamie tackles Patty's skin damage from alcohol, smoking and the sun.

episodes.name: I Want My Smile Back
episodes.overview: Newly engaged Louis asks for help to restore his smile and stop the stares after enduring traumatic injuries from a collision with a drunken driver.

episodes.name: Fixing My Face
episodes.overview: Ready to find her confidence after the end of her marriage, Kate turns to treatment for a boost. College-bound Trevor contends with chronic acne.

episodes.name: Implant Removal & Excess Skin
episodes.overview: Vocalist Cassie runs into issues when she seeks surgery for excess skin. Due to her physical job and bad memories, Traci wants her implants out.
